game.name: Rules: Motel Horizon
game.shortDescription: Try yourself as the night clerk at the mysterious “Horizon” Motel, where rules come first, and visitors from another world try to pass as ordinary people. This is the “Horizon” Motel — where breaking the rules leads to... serious consequences.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start your job as a night administrator at the mysterious Horizon Motel, where visitors from another world try to pass as ordinary people, and the rules have the highest priority — breaking them leads to… undesirable consequences.
